task.title: Import a Public Key
task.shortdesc: This page allows you import an existing public key. Use this if you have an existing SSH key on your system you want to use with your Eucalyptus instances.

step.cmd: Enter a name for the key pair in the Name text box.
Paste the contents of your SSH key into the SSH key contents text box, or click on the Browse... link to read the contents of an existing SSH key file.
